title: Tiny Brains 2013 MULTi2 RePack-RG Mechanics
description:
:::::: RG Mechanics PRESENTS ::::::


:::: Tiny Brains 2013 MULTi2 RePack-RG Mechanics ::::


::Information::


Year : 2013 
Genre : Arcade , Platform , Logic , Puzzle , 3D 
Developer : Spearhead Games 
Publisher : 505 Games 
Publication Type : RePack 
Language : RUS | ENG 
Voice set Language : ENG 
Tablet : [ALI213]


::Description::


Tiny Brains cooperative puzzle game in which four players play the role 
of laboratory rodents with very small, but outstanding brains. Passing a 
series of tests for each of the characters has their own unique abilities, 
and the joint work will allow rodents to overcome obstacles.
